Eric Alba

18 Dec 2017

Better image of “Telestron“ . Thanks to @VTProDesign for giving @kindakash and I a preview before launch at @DayForNightFest . I stood in line to see this 6 Times during the fest. And I hate lines. I showed a video of your piece to a child and he has some questions: 1. What are the robots’ names? 2. Are they friends? (if “No”, he says they should be friends) and 3. Are they talking to each other? I hope you got some answers. 😉
